name: Magpie WOM
description: What is the project about? Magpie XYZ is a multi-chain platform built to boost yields for liquidity providers and governance token holders of veTokenomics protocols. Essentially the platform incentivizes governance token holders and liquidity providers to pool their assets together so that the platform can acquire governance tokens, convert them into veTokens, boost yield for liquidity providers, and in return share part of the protocol revenues derived from liquidity providers’ boosted profits back to governance token holders. What makes your project unique? History of your project. What’s next for your project? What can your token be used for? mWOM refers to "Magpie WOM", is a liquid version of veWOM that allows users to earn passive income on the platform. WOM holders can convert their tokens into mWOM on Magpie to earn boosted APR.
